This page contains database of all words borrowed from Arabic into the different languages of Daghestan
```{r echo = FALSE, results = 'asis', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(DT)

  data = read_csv("database.csv"),
  caption = "Table shows all words borrowed from Arabic into the different languages of Daghestan",
  filter = "top"
)
```
